official_title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to add Catawba and Cleveland Counties, North Carolina to the Appalachian region.

summary.text: Amends Federal provisions concerning Appalachian regional development to revise the definition of "Appalachian region" to include Catawba and Cleveland Counties in North Carolina.

titles.title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to add Catawba and Cleveland Counties, North Carolina to the Appalachian region.
